name: Userstyles – Minimalistic stylish look
description: A minimalistic and stylish look. Please keep in mind that this is a work in progress and I am working on it as much as I can, however if you find something that I have forgot - please let me know in the comments! Please leave a rating if you liked the userstyle!

user.name: Crystallis
user.about: Commenting and rating is always appreciated. ツ

additional_info:
Oct 16, 2014 - initial release
Oct 21, 2014 - changed the good and bad rating thumbs
Nov 01, 2014 - changed the color of deleted styles and styles with no images
Nov 02, 2014 - made it firefox compatible
Feb 21, 2015 - minor fixes
